techmeme.title: Apple's macOS Sequoia 15.2 update references a "MacBook Air (13-inch, M4, 2025)" and a "MacBook Air (15-inch, M4, 2025)" (Juli Clover/MacRumors)
Sources: Google Pixel 9a will cost $499 for the 128GB model with Tensor G4, 8GB of RAM, a 6.3" screen with 2,700 peak nits, 5,100mAh battery, 23W wired charging (Alexander Maxham/Android Headlines)
Apple Intelligence launches outside of the US for the first time and is now available in Canada, Australia, New Zealand, Ireland, the UK, and South Africa (Joe Rossignol/MacRumors)
Google releases Gemini 2.0 Flash to generate images, audio, and text, and use third-party apps and services, available via Gemini API and developer platforms (Kyle Wiggers/TechCrunch)
Google unveils Deep Research, an AI tool to let its Gemini chatbot scour the web and write a detailed report, available in English for Gemini Advanced users (Emma Roth/The Verge)
